trans-unit.source: Provides a designer that enables you to visually design composite activities.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um designer que permite a você criar visualmente atividades de composição.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> to visually design composite activities, to customize the layout, and to manage the drawing of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> para criar visualmente atividades compostas, para personalizar o layout e para gerenciar o desenho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> also enables you to manage events for the contained activity designers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> também permite que você gerencie eventos para os designers de atividade contida.

trans-unit.source: It also enables you to customize and manage the position, size, and layout of contained activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Ele também permite personalizar e gerenciar a posição, o tamanho e o layout dos designers de atividade contida.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma instância do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application look and feel for people with disabilities.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que os aplicativos de acessibilidade usam para ajustar a aparência do aplicativo para pessoas com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> associado ao controle.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> atualmente atribuído ao controle, uma nova instância de um é criada.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.AccessibilityObject%2A> propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o assembly de acessibilidade instalado com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre objetos acessíveis, consulte a seção de acessibilidade ativa da biblioteca MSDN.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> can be collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> pode ser recolhido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified composite activity designer can be collapsed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o designer de atividade composta especificado pode ser recolhido; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Some composite designers will have multiple designers within.
trans-unit.target: Alguns designers compostos terá vários designers no.

trans-unit.source: These designers can implement expanding or collapsing to save room on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Esses designers podem implementar expandindo ou recolhendo para economizar espaço na tela.

trans-unit.source: The location to insert the activities.
trans-unit.target: O local para inserir as atividades.

trans-unit.source: A read-only array of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz somente leitura do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> a ser inserido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether activities can be inserted into the composite activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se as atividades podem ser inseridas na atividade de composição associada ao designer.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if activities can be inserted into the composite activity associated with the designer; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as atividades puderem ser inseridas na atividade de composição associada ao designer; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> to determine if a list of activities can be inserted into a composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> para determinar se uma lista de atividades pode ser inserida em uma atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to lock a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> by not allowing the insertion of child activities.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como bloquear uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> por não permitir a inserção de filho atividades.

trans-unit.source: The location from which to move the activities.
trans-unit.target: O local do qual mover as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The read-only array of activities to move.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de atividades somente leitura a ser movida.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether activities contained within the composite activity can be moved out of the composite activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se as atividades contidas dentro da atividade de composição podem ser movidas fora da atividade de composição associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the activities can be moved from the composite activity; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as atividades puderem ser movidas da atividade de composição; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> to determine if a list of activities can be moved from within a composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> para determinar se uma lista de atividades pode ser movida dentro de uma atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> método para permitir a movimentação de atividades filho dentro do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: A read-only array of activities to remove from the composite activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de atividades somente leitura a ser removida da atividade de composição associada ao designer.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates if activities can be removed from the composite activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se as atividades podem ser removidas da atividade de composição associada ao designer.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the activities can be removed from the composite activity; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as atividades puderem ser removidas da atividade de composição; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> to determine if a list of contained activities can be removed from the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> para determinar se uma lista de atividades contidas pode ser removida da atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> método para permitir a movimentação de atividades filho dentro do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the array of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a matriz do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> contido dentro do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção somente leitura de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> accessor to retrieve a read-only collection of the designers contained within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> acessador para recuperar uma coleção somente leitura dos designers contidos a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Component serialization service.
trans-unit.target: Serviço de serialização do componente.

trans-unit.source: Object that contains activities to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contém atividades a serem desserializadas.

trans-unit.source: Deserializes items from an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> received during a drag-and-drop operation or from the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Desserializa itens de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> recebido durante uma operação do tipo "arrastar e soltar" ou da área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: An array of activities deserialized from an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de atividades desserializadas de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: The contained designer to make visible.
trans-unit.target: O designer independente a ser tornado visível.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the contained designer is visible.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o designer contido está visível.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> to make sure the contained designer is visible.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> para certificar-se de que o designer independente fica visível.

trans-unit.source: In a custom designer you can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> to make visible a designer located within a collapsed composite designer.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer personalizado, você pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> para tornar visível um designer localizado dentro de um designer de compostos recolhido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that contains the expand or collapse button.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que contém o botão de expansão ou de recolhimento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that encloses the expand or collapse button.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que inclui o botão expandir ou recolher.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ExpandButtonRectangle%2A> to return a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> that describes the area of the screen that encloses the expand button on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ExpandButtonRectangle%2A> para retornar um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> que descreve a área da tela que inclui o botão de expansão em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for detecting mouse events to react to your requests to expand or collapse a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para detectar eventos de mouse para reagir às solicitações para expandir ou recolher um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> is expanded.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> é expandido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> is expanded; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> for expandido; caso contrário <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: In combination with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnMouseDown%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ExpandButtonRectangle%2A>, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> to determine the proper action when a user clicks the expand or collapse button on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Em combinação com <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnMouseDown%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ExpandButtonRectangle%2A>, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> para determinar a ação apropriada quando um usuário clica no botão expandir ou recolher no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> property based on a `Boolean` value passed as an argument to a method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como você pode definir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> propriedade com base em um `Boolean` valor passado como um argumento para um método.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK sample from the ViewHost.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo ViewHost.cs SDK do Monitor de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [o Monitor de fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable object contained within the designer.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro objeto selecionável contido dentro do designer.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> to return the first selectable object contained within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> para retornar o primeiro objeto selecionável contido a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The top-level designer to analyze.
trans-unit.target: O designer de nível superior a ser analisado.

trans-unit.source: Area within the top-level designer to analyze.
trans-unit.target: Área dentro do designer de nível superior a ser analisada.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves designers belonging to the specified root activity that intersect a specified area.
trans-unit.target: Recupera os designers pertencentes à atividade raiz especificada que interseccionam uma área especificada.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> objects that intersect a portion of the Rectangle specified.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> que interseccionam uma parte do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual na ordem da navegação.

trans-unit.source: The direction to navigate.
trans-unit.target: A direção a ser navegada.

trans-unit.source: 0 = next; 1 = previous; 2 = left; 3 = right.
trans-unit.target: 0 = próximo; 1 = anterior; 2 = esquerda; 3 = direita.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object which is next in the order of navigation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto que vem a seguir na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: The object that is next in the order of navigation.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que é o próximo na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.GetNextSelectableObject%2A> causes the selection to move from the current selection to the next selectable object in the direction specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.GetNextSelectableObject%2A> faz com que a seleção mover-se na seleção atual para o próximo objeto selecionável na direção especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of glyphs with which to adorn the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de glifos com os quais adornar o designer de atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> that contains the glyphs to display on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> que contém os glifos para exibir no designer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents a single x and y coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que representa uma única coordenada x e y.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> at a specified point on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações sobre o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> em um ponto especificado na tela.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que contém informações sobre o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> em um ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, together with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> control is used to determine which part of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> controls you have clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, junto com o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> método do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> controle é usado para determinar qual parte de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> controles que você clicou.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contains logical coordinates of the point on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> where the mouse was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contém lógicas coordenadas do ponto no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> onde o mouse foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> method receives a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> that contains an x and y coordinate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> método recebe um <xref:System.Drawing.Point> que contém um x e y de coordenadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for the enclosing bounds of the image associated with the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor para os limites da imagem associada ao designer em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that encloses the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> displayed for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo que contém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> exibido para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> to retrieve the coordinates for the rectangle that encloses the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> para recuperar as coordenadas para o retângulo que contém a imagem associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: You can use these coordinates for drawing connectors or overlaying graphics.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essas coordenadas para desenhar conectores ou sobreposição de elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> é calculado usando os limites do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with which the designer should be initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> com o qual o designer deve ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Initialize%2A> loads the designer with the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Initialize%2A> carrega o designer com especificado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.

trans-unit.source: The designer loads the activity service, updates the verbs associated with the activity, and assigns the default text and image to the designer.
trans-unit.target: O designer carrega o serviço de atividade, atualiza os verbos associados à atividade e atribui o texto padrão e a imagem para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Inserts activities into the designer.
trans-unit.target: Insere as atividades no designer.

trans-unit.source: The location in the designer to insert the activities.
trans-unit.target: O local no designer para inserir as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The list of activities to insert.
trans-unit.target: A lista de atividades a ser inserida.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified activities in the designer at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Insere as atividades especificadas no designer no local especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> to insert a list of activities into the location specified.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> para inserir uma lista de atividades no local especificado.

trans-unit.source: Prior to calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A>, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> to make sure that the specified activities can be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A>, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> para certificar-se de que as atividades especificadas podem ser inseridas.

trans-unit.source: The designer into which the activities will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O designer no qual as atividades serão inseridas.

trans-unit.source: The location in the designer at which the activities will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O local no designer no qual as atividades serão inseridas.

trans-unit.source: The list of activities to insert.
trans-unit.target: A lista de atividades a ser inserida.

trans-unit.source: Description for the designer transaction created by the insertion.
trans-unit.target: Descrição da transação de designer criada pela inserção.

trans-unit.source: Inserts activities into the designer at the specified location using a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Insere atividades no designer no local especificado usando uma transação.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> to insert a list of activities into the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> para inserir uma lista de atividades a atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: Prior to calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A>, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> to make sure the specified list of activities can be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A>, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> para certificar-se de que a lista especificada de atividades pode ser inserida.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the addition of a new branch using a designer based off of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra a adição de uma nova ramificação de usando um designer com base no logoff de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> returns true, a new branch is created using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> retorna true, uma nova ramificação é criada usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The designer contained within the CompositeActivityDesigner to test for visibility.
trans-unit.target: O designer contido dentro do CompositeActivityDesigner a ser testado para visibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if the contained designer is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer contido está visível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the contained designer is visible; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o designer contido estiver visível; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.IsContainedDesignerVisible%2A> to determine if the specified designer is visible.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.IsContainedDesignerVisible%2A> para determinar se o designer especificado está visível.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer can be edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer pode ser editado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer can be edited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o designer pode ser editado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Some custom activities might not allow you to modify properties or other settings in the design environment.
trans-unit.target: Algumas atividades personalizadas talvez não permitam a modificação de propriedades ou outras configurações no ambiente de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.IsEditable%2A> property should determine whether the designer allows edits at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.IsEditable%2A> propriedade deve determinar se o designer permite a edição em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável contido dentro do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The last selectable object contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O último objeto selecionável contido a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> to return the last selectable object contained within the designer.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> para retornar o último objeto selecionável contido dentro do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> from which to load the view state.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> do qual carregar o estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Restores the view state from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o estado de exibição de um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A> to restore the designer to a state previously saved using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.SaveViewState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A> para restaurar o designer em um estado salvo anteriormente usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.SaveViewState%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o local do designer nas coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: The location of the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O local do designer em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Location%2A> to position the designer at design or run time.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Location%2A> para posicionar o designer no design ou tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> describing the location to which to move the activities.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que descreve o local para o qual mover as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The list of activities to move.
trans-unit.target: A lista de atividades a ser movida.

trans-unit.source: Moves activities from one designer to another.
trans-unit.target: Move atividades de um designer para outro.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.MoveActivities%2A> to move a list of activities from one composite activity to another.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.MoveActivities%2A> para mover uma lista de atividades de uma atividade composta para outro.

trans-unit.source: The activity designer to move.
trans-unit.target: O designer de atividade a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move the designer backwards; <see langword="false" /> to move the designer forward.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para mover o designer para trás; <see langword="false" /> para mover o designer para frente.

trans-unit.source: Moves a designer forward or backwards in index within the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Move um designer para frente ou para trás no índice dentro da atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.MoveDesigners%2A> to move an activity contained within the composite activity forward or backwards in the index of contained activities.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.MoveDesigners%2A> para mover uma atividade contida na atividade composta para frente ou para trás no índice de atividades contidas.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> containing information about the change.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre a alteração.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when more than one activities contained within the designers have changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando mais de uma atividade contida dentro do designer tiverem sido alteradas.

trans-unit.source: This occurs, for example, when a new child activity is added or an existing child activity is removed.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre, por exemplo, quando uma nova atividade filho é adicionada ou uma atividade filho existente é removida.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnContainedActivitiesChanged%2A> to respond to changes to activities inside the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnContainedActivitiesChanged%2A> para responder às mudanças nas atividades dentro da atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="listChangeArgs" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="listChangeArgs" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains information about the change.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre a alteração.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an activity or a group of activities contained within the designer are changing.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma atividade ou um grupo de atividades contidas dentro do designer estão sendo alteradas.

trans-unit.source: This occurs, for example, when a new child activity is added or an existing child activity is removed.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre, por exemplo, quando uma nova atividade filho é adicionada ou uma atividade filho existente é removida.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnContainedActivitiesChanging%2A> to respond to changes that are occurring to the activities contained within the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnContainedActivitiesChanging%2A> para responder às alterações que estão ocorrendo para as atividades contidas dentro da atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="listChangeArgs" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="listChangeArgs" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs" /> that contains information about the change.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre a alteração.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an activity contained within the designer has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma atividade contida dentro do designer foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnContainedActivityChanged%2A> to respond to changes in the activities contained within the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnContainedActivityChanged%2A> para responder a alterações em atividades contidas dentro da atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed with the designer in focus.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma tecla for pressionada com o designer em foco.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout and positioning tasks for the contained visual cues or designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> to reposition its child activities.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de posicionamento e de layout para designers ou indicações visuais contidos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> para reposicionar suas atividades filho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnLayoutPosition%2A> performs layout tasks for all of the child activity designers that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> contains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnLayoutPosition%2A> executa tarefas de layout para todos os designers de atividade filho que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> contém.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called to calculate the size needed for an activity based on its current state (collapsed or expanded) and its list of child activities.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para calcular o tamanho necessário para uma atividade baseada em seu estado atual (recolhido ou expandido) e sua lista de atividades filho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the new size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contém as novas configurações de tamanho para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> performs resizing tasks for each activity designer that the composite activity designer contains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> executa tarefas de redimensionamento para cada designer de atividade que contém o designer de atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse is clicked when the pointer is in designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o mouse é clicado quando o ponteiro estiver nos limites de designer.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: If the designer is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações no estado de botão do mouse, posição do ponteiro e estado de teclado são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o usuário sai dos limites do designers, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse enters another designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A> for that designer is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o mouse entra outro designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A> para este designer é gerado.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse state, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the `Action` property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no estado de teclado ou mouse, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da `Action` propriedade do evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Continue`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up-to-date feedback about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> eventos são combinados para que, como o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário é fornecido com os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem pode executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the drawing data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of a composite activity at design time.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a representação visual de uma atividade de composição em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer that the associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer de que o tema associado foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> occurs any time the theme associated with the designer changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> Ocorre sempre que o tema associado às alterações de designer.

trans-unit.source: When the theme changes it is likely that the designer look and feel needs to change.
trans-unit.target: Quando as alterações de tema é provável que a aparência designer precisa ser alterado.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> to be used for painting.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> a ser usado para pintura.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the clip region on the graphics object and calls <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" /> on all contained designers.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta a região de recorte no objeto gráfico e chama <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" /> em todos os designers contidos.

trans-unit.source: Removes all activities from the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as atividades do designer de atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.RemoveActivities%2A> to remove activities from the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.RemoveActivities%2A> para remover atividades da atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: A list of activities to remove from the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de atividades a ser removida do designer.

trans-unit.source: Removes a list of activities from the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Remove uma lista de atividades do designer de atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: Removes the list of activities from the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Remove a lista de atividades a atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: The service provider associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de serviço associado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: The list of activities to remove.
trans-unit.target: A lista de atividades a ser removida.

trans-unit.source: The description of the transaction created.
trans-unit.target: A descrição da transação criada.

trans-unit.source: Removes the list of activities from the designer using a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Remove a lista de atividades do designer usando uma transação.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.RemoveActivities%2A> to remove the specified list of activities from the composite activity within the specified transaction.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.RemoveActivities%2A> para remover a lista especificada de atividades da atividade composta dentro da transação especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" /> into which the view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" /> em que o estado de exibição é armazenado.

trans-unit.source: Saves the view state to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Salva o estado de exibição em um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.SaveViewState%2A> to save the state of a composite activity to a stream.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.SaveViewState%2A> para salvar o estado de uma atividade composta em um fluxo.

trans-unit.source: To restore the view state use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para restaurar o uso do estado de exibição <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Component serialization service.
trans-unit.target: Serviço de serialização do componente.

trans-unit.source: Array of activities to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de atividades a ser serializada.

trans-unit.source: Serializes an array of activities to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> that can be placed into the clipboard or used when initializing a drag and drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Serializa uma matriz de atividades para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> que pode ser colocado na área de transferência ou usado ao inicializar uma operação do tipo "arrastar e soltar".

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> that contains serialized activities.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> que contém atividades serializadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the description rectangle in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do retângulo de descrição em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: The value of the description rectangle in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O valor do retângulo descrição em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Use to determine the location on the designer where the text description will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Use para determinar o local no designer do qual a descrição será exibida.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> as well as the location and size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> é calculado usando os limites do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> , bem como o local e o tamanho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the title area of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura da área de título do designer.

trans-unit.source: The height in pixels of the title area of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A altura em pixels da área de título do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.TitleHeight%2A> describes the height of the title area of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.TitleHeight%2A> descreve a altura da área de título do designer.

trans-unit.source: Typically this can contain the heading, icon, and expand or collapse button.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso pode conter título, ícone e expandir ou recolher o botão.
